txt.en: 'So you are not happy with your blonde sorrel horse? Well, I can offer you an exchange, as I would not want one of my horses where it was not desired. However, this is not a decision to take lightly, so I will give you a moment to think about this.\n\n'If you are really sure you wish to exchange your horse, speak to me again, and I will give you a receipt in return. You can then exchange the receipt for a different horse.'

'So you have decided you want to exchange your blonde sorrel after all? So be it. Look over this receipt and tell me if it looks fine to you.\n\n'And this time, I hope you are more sure of your choice. Choosing a horse should not be something done lightly!'
Cam Applewood has told you that you can exchange your blonde sorrel horse for another.
Give your blonde sorrel horse to Cam

Cam Applewood is at the Hengstacer Farm, north of the Bree Festival Grounds.\n\nCam suggested you take a moment to consider whether or not you wish to exchange your horse. If you decide that you do, you should speak to Cam again.
